Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of the Patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob:

Text.Language: Mpererp~wbs n~]dia~y/k/: y/e~takcemn/tc nem nenio]: Abraam Icaak Iakwb: Pic~ra/l pieyouab n~tak.
Do not forget the covenant: which You have made with our fathers: Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob: Israel, Your holy one.
لا تنس العهد الذي قررته مع ابائنا ابراهيم واسحق ويعقوب اسرائيل قديسك.
